item.title: ADOY - Lemon

KY: 27322 / KY: 93841

Oh no I saw you
on the TV today
You made me dizzy
automatically
Baby you couldn’t
be my lady okay
Envy it’s always
automatic to me
You
lemonade

on the TV

can you see me(oh no)

item.title: ADOY - Grace

작곡: 오주환, Zee, 정다.. / 작사: 오주환, Zee, 정다..

Tell me
where to go
Turn on the radio
of the city lights
Will you take me
to the show
To the places
that we know
Drivin’
through the night
Always
every day a sailor
Surfin’
on the silver tide
Together
now
Make us turn away
from all the shackles
And the pain
you know that all day
I’ll
love you
I feel
that I can’t be
Feelin’ lonely
ever again
Cuz I know
I always was
Dreaming of a day
like today
Why don’t you tell me
you’re breaking away
Why don’t you tell me
this cannot replay
So tell me
where to go

was a love song

For

item.title: ADOY - Pool
item.description:
작곡: 오주환, Zee / 작사: 오주환, Zee
KY: 21277

Suddenly
I’m drivin’ away
Into
the shining ocean
Finally
I’m breakin’ away
From
the echoing motion
You don’t ask me
to stay
Cuz
I am wide awake
I don’t need
to be a savvy person
If I wanna stay
alive
I don’t need
to be a savvy person
To be a man
inside and out
Cuz I’m wide awake
cuz I’m wide awake

From all the running
questions
Finally

a new emotion

on the left
Lane out
in a rush
Looking back
at the red lights
Passing
us by
Yes
I know
We shouldn’t go
that far
But I could
wonder
Gimme a feeling
slowly in a deja vu
Gimme a feeling
do you wanna

too

Gimme a feeling
‘cause you wanna
